verbs.description: WASHINGTON ( FOX NEWS ) -- [ARG0: National Security Adviser John Bolton] [V: suggested] [ARGM-TMP: Sunday] [ARG1: that President Trump will not meet with Kim Jong Un unless the North Korean leader agrees to give up his country ’s entire nuclear weapons program] .
